Articles.Content: Trading science secrets with Xannari's forces? CHEATER.
Using all caps on a word! cHEATER (See, I didn't use all caps on a word)
Nobody can tame the kraken, cheater!
Invoking the name of the kracken - cheater!
Providing SEMI-quality flying craft on KerbalX? CHEATER.
Getting to a rescue plane? HAXXXX! NO one gets to the medivac in time!
Hacks are spelt Hacks and not Haxxx. Obvious cheater
Getting into a Kraken bug is obviously violation of the rules and (coloq. cheating). No one got stuck in there - if they were alive, of course.
Not wanting more volts? CHEATER
In a rescue plane? Cheater!
using the same accusation as at least 4 other people on TrainEngie? Cheater! Find something else to accuse him of!

using the same accusation as at least 4 other people on TrainEngie? Cheater! Find something else to accuse him of!

Teleporting is illegal CHEATER! xD
I have no closet, only a wardrobe, so getting there was obviously achieved by cheating.

I have no closet, only a wardrobe, so getting there was obviously achieved by cheating.

Just as in Monopoly, it is only cheating if you get caught. So-- admitting you cheated? Cheater!
Finding a completely unrelated reason to accuse me of cheating? Cheater!
Using "unrelated cheats" is cheating.
Having 42 posts? You can't have the answer to everything! Cheater!
Having a Twitter but also not having a twitter? CONTRADICTORY CHEAT!
Having 42 posts after posting a reply to having 42 posts? ... I'm seariously confused. Cheats?

Not noticing game posts don't count anymore? CHEATER...

Wait, do game posts still count?
Thinking game posts count towards post count? It's like you didn't even glance at the rules. Non-cheating posts in the KSP areas of the forum are all that count for us fair posters.
cheaters because you have now ideas at all and even less for more ; )
On a falling rock? You got there by flyhack! Cheater!

Not knowing how this is played or what is even going on.... dammit, I must be a cheater.

(decides to go to page 1 and see what this is all about!)

EDIT!

OK... so, sorry... ummm, lets see....

nope... don't get it, ignore this post and I'll try and figure it out. You're all cheats by the way!

OK... got it....

HERE IT IS: Talking about a "flyhack" means you must be a cheater....

Edits? cheats! I call cheats! Thought you could get away with it, didn't you?
